content:
"Well, well!" You hear Kal calling from behind you. "You're pretty quick on your feet, even in the dark!"

He sits down on a nearby rock and takes a quick swig from his infusion canteen. He smiles, teeth flashing in the gloom. "You won fair and square, even if I was only a few steps behind you!" He reaches into his pack and hands you a compact parcel marked with the Orlin sigil. "A gift to commemorate your victory," he says. "When I beat you next time, I don't want you complaining that you were too tired to race!"

Gain the Memlev Hammock reward card. Each Ranger soothes 2 fatigue. Discard Kal Iver and return HELPING HAND to the collection. Write down that you BESTED KAL.

If you are at the Terminal Artery and traveled there from Carbonforged Maze, go to 158.2. Otherwise, if you are at the Terminal Artery, go to 158.1.
